login-message: Plase login to your account and try the app.
enter-email-title: Enter your account with your email.
password-invalid: Password must be at least 8 characters
password-regex: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
go-back-button: Go back to select other option!
reset-password-title:
Please insert your email to
 reset your password.
check-email-title:
Please check your email to create
 a new account.
check-inbox:
Check your inbox to validate the email
 and
resend-email-button: You can resend the email in:
warning-email-checked: There is no email checked. Please, try again!
warning-two-passwords: The two passwords must be the same.
warning-email-in-use:
This email is already in use.
Please try another one.
error-mail-configure: Please configure a mail client to continue.
error-unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error-google-unknown: An unknown error occurred during login.
error-google-play-services: Something went wrong with Google Services
success-email-sent:
If the email is correct, you will
 receive a confirmation email.
success-log-in:
User created successfully.
Plase log in with credentials
success-log-out:
Log out successfully!
See you next time!
success-password-updated:
Password updated successfully.
Please log in with new credentials.
logout-message: Are you sure you want to log out?
error-request-timeout:
Request timed out. Please check your
connection and try again.
error-network:
No internet connection. Please check your
network and try again.
error-server:
Server is experiencing issues.
Please try again later.
error-rate-limit-login:
Too many failed login attempts.
Please try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
error-rate-limit-reset:
Too many password reset requests.
Please try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
error-rate-limit-email:
Too many email verification requests.
Please try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
